page.title: 04Church Lads And Girls Brig.
page.content: I am a member of the Girls Brigade. The brigade has three different age groups.YG and YBC are 7 to 10 years old. JTC is 10 to 13 years old and SC is 13 to 16 years old. My company meets on Thursdays.The older ones meet on Fridays. We go to Church on every second week of each month and to the High School once a month. We have a parade once a year and we also enter a float in the Barwell Carnival. {Nicola Duncombe Cl.9 BJS I am in the Barwell Methodist's Guides.We meet every Thursday.We do a lot of badge work. In seven months I have done 4 badges. When we have done our work we play games. {Susan Mcleod Cl.9 BJS {
